comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Nautical pictures of interest., and we'd love to have this added to the group! Is there any particular significance to this gentleman? I notice the nautical 'touch' here......the figurehead, the canon, the wheel over the door.

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content:
Hi FrigateRN,

C.F. Perry  was the manager of Castle Yards at Woolwich and Charlton from 1885 to 1905. There are some more images of his family outside the front of their house in this set.
